page.title: 16YOUTH
page.content: Youth (1). There is some concern that young people will leave the area because of a lack of employment opportunities and the high cost of housing. "The village will become populated by old people and by people with second homes. I'm not hopeful as far as jobs go." (Girl, 15) "It has'nt got a lot to offer in terms of jobs so I'm not too hopeful." (Boy, 13) Despite these fears, young people are generally contented and value the freedom and space of the countryside. They also like the feeling of belonging to a small community. Most wish to stay in the area and want the area to remain much the same but hope that sports facilities can be improved.
